Reviews.Title: POOR QUALITY
Reviews.Author: Timay
Reviews.Content: Very poor quality. I placed thse on my garage door and windows . After the 1st rain the stickers were basicly ruined,the red ink ran . Dont Buy !

Reviews.Title: They are fading.
Reviews.Author: linda sider
Reviews.Content: The signs are fading in the sun and rain.  Understood they were for outside.  Not much good if someone cannot read them.

Reviews.Title: Not weather proof
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: This item is not weather proof they don't work well outdoors and fade in a couple of weeks.  It doesn't seem to matter if they are in the sun or not they fade even in shaded areas.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: jow
Reviews.Content: Placed these on my windows and they faded in the sun after 1 month ,  looking for another product.Dont waste your money on these

ProductInfo.Features:
These Decals can be applied to any smooth surface
Easily posted and removed
This is the quick, easy way to warn criminals that they are being watched
These signs are your first line of defense against criminals
Package: 10 of 3 x 2 inch and 2 of 11.5"x8.3" stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 12 Home CCTV Surveillance Security Camera Video Sticker Warning Decal Window Alarm Signs CKK
